title: GoPro: Monkey Stole My GoPro
description:
Watch as a thieving monkey in Bali surprises a tourist by taking what's most precious to him.

Special thanks to Ailton Schoemberger and Garry English.

Shot 100% on the HD HERO3®

Music Courtesy of ExtremeMusic
